reviews.comments: Nos gustó el departamento , muy amplio, muy buena ubicación, muy bien equipado, lo recomendamos
Todo excelente, Luis es un gran anfitrion, cumplio con todo tal cual lo acordado. El lugar es muy lindo y en una muy buena ubicacion.

Es un lugar bien ubicado. El departamento está en un edificio con una arquitectura muy interesante. A pesar de que es un edificio antiguo  el departamento está muy bien mantenido y con una decoración sencilla y de buen gusto.
Me sorprendieron: las dimensiones (espacios muy amplios), el detalle del baño que se accede desde el living y desde el dormitorio y que a pesar de estar en pleno centro, no se sentía casi el ruido de la calle. Fuimos con chicos grandes, para niños pequeños hay que tener cuidado con las galerías de acceso al departamento.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por elegirnos y los esperamos nuevamente. Valioso el comentario sobre la seguridad para niños en las galerías del edificio. Lo incorporaré a mis recomendaciones.

reviews.comments:
El apartamento de Luis es un lugar fantástico para hospedarse. Bien decorado, espacioso y luminoso. Con todo lo necesario para una estadía confortable. 
Se disfruta mucho del silencio y la comodidad. Baño cómodo y buena agua caliente. La zona es bien conectada y opciones de movilidad. Supermercados, tiendas, casas de comida, kioscos 24hs.
Luis es un excelente anfitrión: siempre comunicado, a disposición, amable y generoso. Cuenta con Juan, el encargado del edificio, quien es muy amable y predispuesto a hacerte sentir como en casa. Seguramente, quienes disfrutamos de los edificios antiguos, con la comodidad de casa, vamos a volver. 
Gracias Luis!
Excelente departamento. Súpercomodo y muy bien ubicado. Luis y Juan están siempre atentos por cualquier imprevisto que pueda surgir. Muy recomendable. Seguramente esté de vuelta por ahí muy pronto.
Hermoso departamento, muy cómodo y recomendable. Con mi esposo nos sentimos como en casa.

El departamento de Luis es precioso y lo recomiendo plenamente. Incluso mejor de lo que se ve en las fotos. Se encuentra en un edificio de una calidad y construcción como ya no se encuentran. Es súper amplio y cómodo. Ha sido remodelado y decorado con buen gusto. Conserva detalles antiguos hermosos. Tiene todo lo que se necesita para una estadía placentera.
La comunicación con Luis fue óptima. El portero se encuentra disponible permanentemente y es muy servicial. 
La ubicación en pleno microcentro es muy buena para manejarse a pie a las zonas mas concurridas y con excelente acceso al transporte público de corta y larga distancia. 
La seguridad de la calle podría ser mejor si fuese mas iluminada y transitada, aunque esta lejos de ser mala. Nos sentimos seguros en todo momento.
El único inconveniente que le encuentro es el ruido de la gente que sale de la discoteca de en frente a la madrugada los fin de semana.  No es un problema durante la noche porque ni la musica ni la gente se escuchan. Sólo es problema alrededor de las 6am cuando la gente se amontona en la calle al salir y se escuchan voces y gritos. Cuando esa gente se va el problema desaparece, (dura alrededor de media hora). 
Por todo lo demás es un lugar al que volvería y al que recomiendo sin dudar.
La pasamos muy lindo el depto fue muy comodo. Vamos a volver gracias por todo

El departamento muy amplio y cómodo, muy lindo decorado y bien ubicado en pleno centro. Lo negativo fue el ruido del boliche de enfrente , porque hay un boliche. 
Luis muy atento en lo que fue el proceso de reserva y luego nos llamó al ratito que llegamos.
El edificio es hermoso.

Muy buen departamento, confortable y bello. Los ascensores tuvieron problemas recurrentes y tuvimos q usar escaleras en varias oportunidades. La zona del microcentro dónde está ubicado si bien cómoda para el desplazamiento es desagradable (mucho ruido, gente borracha durmiendo en los alrededores, etc.). El anfitrión muy atento y solícito (si bien nuestro contacto fué sólo por este medio)
De 10 excelente

La estadía en el departamento del señor Luis  fue excelente, fuimos bien recibidos, el lugar es muy lindo, estaba todo en perfecto orden, guardaba total coincidencia con la publicación y a raíz de un inconveniente de tipo personal recurrí al señor Luis quien me facilitó la solución inmediata al problema.

El departamento tiene un lindo estilo, amplio, cómodo, es tal cual se ve en las fotos, cerca de todos los lugares tradicionales de BAires, es posible caminar a varios lugares durante el día. 
Tiene todo lo necesario para pasar unos agradables días en la linda capital bonaerense. A tres cuadras de la 9 de Julio , locomoción pública , metro a un par de cuadras.
Excelente ubicación, ideal para parejas.
El departamento está bien ubicado, a una cuadra del obelisco y estación del subte, es un departamento muy bonito y amplio, con adecuada seguridad. Volvería al lugar sin dudas.

Simplemente FANTASTICO!!
El apartament es mejor de lo que aparece en las fotos y la atencion es de 10.  El contacto fluido con Luis o con Juan te da la tranquilidad de que estan siempre para lo que necesites.  El apartamento es muy cómodo, tiene todo lo que se necesita para una estancia placentera.
Sin dudas lo recomiendo 100%.
Departamento muy lindo, comodo, limpio y con amplio espacio. Perfecto para una persona o una pareja. La comunicación con Luis fue muy buena, recomiendo este lugar al 100 %.
reviews.response: Gracias por elegirnos. Seguimos en contacto!

reviews.comments:
El apartamento podria ser precioso, pero la limpiea estaba inexistente. El suelo del cuarto de baño lleno de polvo y pelos. Igual que las puertas y los marcos de las ventanas negras de polvo, del suelo de la cocina no quiero ni hablar!
Si hubieramos tenido otra alternativa nos hubieramos marchado el mismo dia.Le mande' nuestras quejas el mismo dia de llegada a Luis, y me me contesto'
"Lamento las circunstanias". Nada mas.
Nuestra primera experiencia de Airbnb, y la ultima!
reviews.response: Todo feedback es siempre bienvenido. Pero en este caso debo decirle Axel que es el primer huesped entre 118, en los 5 años que participo en AirBNB, que nos hace una devolución semejante. De esos 118 huéspedes, 93 nos han calificado con 5 estrellas en limpieza, y el resto con 4 estrellas. Salvo Usted. La hotelería de Buenos Aires es excelente y espero que pueda disfrutar de nuestra ciudad en otra ocasión en alguno de esos excelentes hoteles.

reviews.comments: Muy bien ubicado para los que nos gusta el tango ... Esta muy cerca de plaza pacifica.
Todo excelente, el anfitrión muy amable y cumple con todo lo que indica el departamento. El departamento es muy agradable y bien ubicado.

Apartamento muy cómodo y muy bien situado en pleno microcentro. 
Salón, dormitorio y cocina magníficos. Internet a buena velocidad.
El anfitrión pendiente para cubrir cualquier necesidad y te facilita un celular.
El cuarto de baño, pequeño y antiguo, no está en consonancia con el resto.

¡ Super recomendado ! El apartamento es mejor de lo que se anuncia , excelente ubicación y con todo lo que necesitas cuando estas de viaje, realmente facilita la experiencia, el detalle del móvil realmente útil y el anfitrión siempre disponible y dispuesto a  colaborar en todo.  Mil Gracias , volveremos

El anfitrión siempre estuvo en comunicación antes y durante la estadía, además que estuvo disponible para cualqueir consulta que pudiéramos tener. El departamento es igual que en las fotos, sino aún más lindo. Absolutamente recomendable!

El apto es  muy cómodo, limpio y luminoso, está  muy bien ubicado, es la segunda vez que nos quedamos en él. Luis como siempre estuvo en contacto con nosotros ,fue  muy receptivo, atento y educado. Volveremos.

Reserve el apartamento de Luis para mi padre que no sabe usar la pc, y según sus palabras: "Estuvo excelente. Tal cual como se veía en las fotos, super cómodo y en una ubicación más que céntrica". saludos

MAGNÍFICO! 
El apartamento es igual que en las fotos: amplio, confortable y acogedor. 
La ubicación inmejorable ya que está en el pleno centro de la ciudad y se puede ir andando a todos los sitios de interés. 
Junto al apartamento está el teatro Colón, el obelisco, restaurantes, cafeterías, supermercados, pastelerías etc. 
Luis es el mejor anfitrión que hemos tenido en nuestra experiencia en Airbnb y otras agencias. La comunicación excelente. Nos ha dado todo tipo de facilidades para nuestra estancia en Argentina, ya que fuimos a Iguazú y nos dejó un teléfono móvil por si tenemos algún problema le llamasemos. 
¡ALTAMENTE RECOMENDABLE!
GRACIAS LUIS!

El apartamento está muy bien ubicado, es luminoso , amplio y  muy limpio.Por la hora de nuestra  llegada no vimos a Luis pero siempre estuvo atento a todo lo que necesitábamos. Volveremos pronto.  Recomendamos a otros huéspedes llamar a radio taxi de noche si van lejos porque es muy barato y seguro.

Un departamento muy bonito, cómodo y amplio, ubicado en un precioso edificio. Aunque resulta fácil movilizarse desde ahí, el barrio no es muy recomendable. De noche puede ser algo peligroso, y el ruido de la discoteque de enfrente no permite dormir los viernes y sábados. 
La llegada al lugar resultó muy simple, nuestro vuelo llegó de madrugada y no tuvimos problemas para llegar ni para recibir la llave. 

En el departamento todo funcionaba correctamente (agua caliente, WiFi, TV, etc.). La cocina está muy equipada, pero faltan algunos detalles para hacerla cómoda. Finalmente, si bien el departamento estaba limpio, se echan de menos fundas (lavables) para los plumones.
reviews.response:
En los 5 años que llevamos alquilando nuestro apartamento, hemos tenido más de 200 huéspedes y ninguno ha reportado incidentes de seguridad en las cercanías. Como toda ciudad muy poblada hay que reforzar los cuidados en la calle y en eso somos muy insistentes. Lamentablemente la seguridad en las calles de Argentina ha ido deteriorándose como he también observado en otros países de América Latina, incluso tu país Pablo. 
El comentario es un feedback personal y no habiendo ocurrido ningún problema concreto pasa a ser una sensación subjetiva.Igualmente es apreciada.

reviews.comments: Vine junto con a mi esposa a Buenos Aires de fin de semana. Ha sido una gratísima experiencia. Si lo que deseas es situarte en el centro, el departamento de Luis es una muy buena alternativa. Es cómodo, fresco, muy limpio, de amplias dependencias y todo funciona adecuadamente. Luis estaba fuera de la ciudad, pero eso no fue inconveniente para que cortésmente respondiera cada una de nuestras inquietudes. En síntesis, lo recomendamos plenamente.

100% Recomendable.
No solo está ubicado en un lugar excelente de Buenos Aires sino que también el departamento estaba igual o incluso mejor que lo que se veía en las fotos. Todo lo necesario para pasar unos días ahí estaba incluído. Super cómodo y espacioso, los tres días hubieron 30 o más grados de calor y dentro del departamento nunca lo sentimos.

Excelente apartamento en una muy buena ubicación en pleno centro de la ciudad. La zona está muy peatonalizada lo que permite moverse con comodidad a pie. Muy bien equipado con todo lo necesario para una estadía placentera. Los sillones cama también son muy cómodos para dormir. Altamente recomendable.
reviews.response: Gracias por el feedback privado. Queremos mejorar siempre y apreciamos las observaciones.

reviews.comments: Luis nos dejo un movil para que lo llevaramos durante toda nuestra estancia en Buenos Aires y si teniamos algun problema o duda, podiamos contactar con el. No hizo falta pero nos dio mucha tranquilidad. El apartamento era bonito y comodo. Esta muy bien ubicado. Nosotros fuimos andando desde la estacion Retiro, que es donde nos dejo el bus de la empresa Manuel Tienda Leon desde el aeropuerto de Ezeiza. Esta cerca de la calle Florida, 9 de julio y Puerto Madero. Hay varias tiendas de alimentacion muy cerca.

Es un apartamento cómodo, limpio y bello y con una buena ubicación, cerca de  diferentes puntos turísticos 
Luis fue amable y preocupado por nosotros dejándonos un móvil a para que nos pudiéramos comunicar con el en todo momento. Recomendable 100% una muy buena experiencia
Buena ubicación y departamento muy cómodo. Tuvimos una excelente estadia, muy recomendado.
Apartamento idealmente situado, espacioso y próximo totalmente de comodidad, buena relación calidad precio.
Luis nos acogo muy bien y el departamento esta muy bien situado y muy lindo.

El departamento es increíble, Muy limpio, acogedor, bien ubicado. Mejor imposible. La llegada fue muy fácil, las llaves estaban en portería y siempre hubo alguien ahí para responder nuestras preguntas. Altamente recomendable, muy centrico y a una distancia caminable de varios puntos atractivos y turísticos de la ciudad.

Tuvimos una muy buena estadía. El apartamento tiene ambientes amplios, limpio, está bien equipado y muy buena ubicación en microcentro. El anfitrión es muy amable y atento. Muy recomendable para pasarla bien en Buenos Aires.

Me quedé en el apto del Sr Luis y es exactamente como en la foto. Un apto elegante, limpio y ordenado. Excelente ubicación y es facil movilizarse caminando. El lugar es silencioso y agradable para pasar la noche, tiene todos los servicios y es muy fácil sentirse cómodo y bienvenido en una ciudad como Buenos Aires. Lo recomiendo 100% por su cercania el subte, al Obelisco, las Galerias Pacífico y la Av. 9 de Julio. El Sr. Luis nos facilitó un teléfono celular y ayudó mucho para poder comunicarnos con nuestras familias. Excelente todo

El apartamento es tal cual como las fotos, excelente, super central (a menos de dos cuadras del Obelisco y con mil lugares cerca para comer, librerias, teatros, etc). Es super amplio, limpio, decorado con buen gusto y completamente dotado, ne me hizo falta nada!
Luis es super amable, te presta un teléfono para que tengas un número local y se preocupa hasta porque tengas jabón, shampoo, crema dental... etc.
Gracias Luis, si vuelo a Bs As, trataré de volver a tu apartamento, lo recomiendo totalmente. 
Lo único malo: En la noche las calles adyacentes tienen mucha basura y personas que eventualmente pueden ser amenazantes, hay que tener un poco de cuidado.
Was a great experience, very happy we went with Luis apartment! Was close to everything and there were recommendations for things to do! Very spacious and clean!
Nice big place, in the centre of Buenos Aires.

Ótima localização, perto de todos meios de transporte, sube e ônibus. Mercados próximos. Alguns moradores de rua na redondeza, mas nada que impeça de andar pela rua. Cozinha bem montada. Boa máquina de lavar. Juan, é o encarregado do prédio que recebeu-nos, solicito também. Muito boa a casa. Grande e espaçosa.

Great location and nice, quiet place to come back to at the end of the day. We were thankful for the A/C as we were here in the middle of summer! Bed is comfortable and overall, it is basic yet stylish.
Experiência maravilhosa, o Sr. Luis sempre muito atencioso e disponível para qualquer dúvida ou situação. A localização é perfeita, há poucos metros do obelisco, super recomendado!!!

The location of Luis' place was great. I was able to walk to several tourist attractions, restaurants, and shows. The building and surrounding neighborhoods were very secure, as I felt safe walking alone at night. The apartment was exactly as pictured and actually ended up being a bit more spacious than I thought it would be. As some previous guests noted, there was a bit of street noise at night, which was expected given that the apartment is in a busy area of downtown. It didn't bother me. The ringing of the parking lot lever as vehicles exited up the street did take some getting used to. Overall, I thoroughly enjoyed my stay. The price was a good value. Luis was a superb host. He addressed all of my questions quickly and clearly and he allowed me to have flexible check-in and check-out times.

Luis and Juan are super nice, they help us with our accommodation. The flat is wow, we love it! It is very beautiful with a european alt bau style, it has everything and everything works fine (warm water, air conditioning, washer, stove, refrigerator, Wi-Fi, tv). It is big and cozy, very centric, with the shopping street close, many restaurants, supermarkets. This is an asset to Buenos Aires!

This lovely European style building, built around a central plaza space, is located right in the heart of downtown. The apartment had high ceilings and classic architecture. We had easy access to public transportation and many wonderful sites. Luis communicated promptly and clearly. My daughter and I had a wonderful stay and highly recommend Luis’ home for your stay in Buenos Aires!
Simplesmente maravilhoso o apartamento!
Melhor localização de Baires. Todos os serviços (metrô, banco, mercado, farmácia, etc) próximos - inclusive na madrugada. Tranquilo de se caminhar, inclusive a noite. 1 quadra da Av. 9 de Julio.

Lindo apartamento. É maior que parece nas fotos. Localização muito próxima de vários pontos de interesse e transporte público. Atendimento excelente, o que solicitamos foi prontamente atendido e as condições do apartamento e tudo o que oferecia estavam excelentes. Recomendamos e esperamos voltar um dia!

O espaço de Luis e incrível. Até melhor do que nas fotos. Fica em uma localização excelente principalmente para quem nunca foi a Buenos Aires e quer se deslocar para diferentes pontos da cidade. Fica a duas quadras do metrô e tem muitas opções de supermercados e restaurantes próximos, para todos os gostos bolsos. Cama e roupa de cama excelentes. Ótimo chuveiro.  A única observação que eu faria e que o chuveiro fica em cima da banheira que e escorregadia e aí eu não recomendaria para idosos e ou pessoas com mobilidade reduzida, mas que não era o nosso caso .
Great location, very near Galerias Pacífico and Teatro Colón, and extremely spacious. The only note I have is to be careful in the shower, as the bathtub can be a bit slippery.

Apartment is exactly as described! Actually a lot bigger than the photos suggest. The check in process was very easy and there were many amenities including extra blankets and towels which we really appreciated! Thanks Luis!
Excelente estadia! Apartamento bem equipado, sala e quarto espaçosos, e ótima localização! O zelador super atencioso e sempre disposto a ajudar. Recomendo e voltaria.

É o melhor lugar para ficar, quando se busca facilidade locomoção e proximidade dos pontos turísticos principais de Buenos Aires.
O apartamento é bonito, muito confortável e funcional. Estava igual ao apresentado no momento da reserva e atendeu a todas as nossas expectativas. O Sr. Luis e o Sr. Juan foram muito solicitos, apesar de não termos sentido falta de qualquer coisa. 
Continua sendo nossa primeira opção, ao voltarmos à Buenos Aires.

Eu e meu esposo ficamos hospedados cinco dias no apartamento do Luis. Apesar de não estar presente, ele nos passou bastante confiança. Foi atencioso em toda a comunicação feita através do (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN). O apartamento está localizado no centro da cidade, próximo a diversos pontos turísticos e estações de metrô, o que facilitou nosso deslocamento. No entanto, ficamos mais atentos no retorno à noite. A partir das 21h se inicia uma movimentação meio estranha aos arredores; pessoas se juntam em alguns pontos para tomar bebidas alcoólicas e conversar. Próximo ao apartamento, logo abaixo da sacada, existe uma espécie de discoteca meio esquisita, a qual atrai várias pessoas aos sábados e domingos a noite. Na madrugada da segunda feira ainda escutávamos muito barulho de pessoas vendendo alimentos na porta desse clube e até umas confusões (pessoas discutindo). Esse foi o único incômodo da nossa estadia. O apartamento encontra-se bem organizado e limpo, com ar condicionado, aquecedor, secador de cabelo, toalhas e edredons à disposição. No geral, foi muito bom!

Lugar surpreendentemente melhor que nas fotos. Tudo estava muito limpo e preparado para nos receber. Apartamento bem localizado, bem próximo a vários restaurantes e da Rua Florida, uma rua ótima para compras. Indico muito e, com certeza, tentarei reservar em outras oportunidades.

The apartment is everything as described and more.  Having stayed in many apartments over 20 years visiting BA, this was by far the best and most restful, central, yet quiet.  The bed was very comfortable, also the sofa beds in the sitting room, I slept like a baby, + everything worked, tvs, washing machine, microwave, oven, hotplates.  All was perfect for us.  Luis was really helpful, providing us with a juicer also, so I could make my special juices which I need every day, how nice is that!  It was quiet, spacious, central, close to all public transport, local shops provided us with everything we needed to self cater.  We will be back, + also our friends who came to visit, decided they loved it too + they will book it in future.  It felt like home very quickly.

O apartamento é espaçoso, bem localizado e próximo de todo tipo de comércio. A roupa de cama e banho é de qualidade. O edifício é charmoso e o Sr Juan (porteiro) uma simpatia de pessoa.
O único que não agradou foi haver apenas uma panela na cozinha e em mau estado de conservação, faltaram também alguns itens básicos de cozinha como por exemplo: uma concha, uma faca de cozinha, uma tábua de cortar alimentos em bom estado de uso e uma frigideira descente. A que encontramos lá está enferrujada. 
A geladeira, o fogão e os fornos estão aprovados.
Luis's apartment is clean, spacious and in a good location close to the main attractions in BA. We enjoyed our stay here. Thank you!

We loved the charm of the apartment, and it was very comfortable! The location was ideal -- we walked everywhere in every direction to catch all the Buenos Aires sights and neighborhoods. Luis and Juan made it very easy to check in and out. If we came back, we'd definitely stay again. 

One thing to note, Buenos Aires is a major city and this apartment is in a happening neighborhood. If you want quiet, this might not be your spot. But if you want a clean, historic place, central location and local hangouts nearby, this is your place. 

I love Buenos Aires!

The apartment is located right in the heart of Buenos Aires, very convenient to all attractions (museums, theaters, shopping areas, public transportation, etc.).  I appreciated Luis' attentiveness before we arrived.  He provided guides and maps which helped ensure we enjoyed our trip as much as possible.  The apartment has a full kitchen and fridge as well as heaters in case you need them during colder days. I definitely recommend this listing! 

El apartamento esta ubicado en el centro de Buenos Aires, a dos cuadras del teatro Colon y muy cerca a todas las atracciones de la ciudad.  La estación del Subte (tren subterráneo) esta a 1 cuadra y media y las estaciones de buses a dos cuadras.  Luis fue muy gentil en responder a todas nuestras preguntas antes de llegar y el encargado, quien tambien vive en el  mismo edificio, nos ofreció ayuda para cuando la necesitáramos.  Definitivamente les recomiendo quedarse en este magnifico lugar.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por tus comentarios. Esperamos poder servirles nuevamente en otra ocasión.

reviews.comments: Het appartement is ruim en heel centraal gelegen in het centrum. Het ligt erg dicht bij het openbaar vervoer dat je overal naartoe brengt. Luis was erg flexibel met mijn aankomst- en vertrektijd en reageert erg snel op vragen een opmerkingen. Hij is een perfecte gastheer.
Wonderful experience. Spacious. Clean. Comfortable. Our host was very accommodating and gracious. We felt completely at home and had everything we needed. Would definitely recommend.

A estadia foi excelente! Ficamos 5 dias hospedados no apartamento de Luis e ele prontamente nos auxiliava para qualquer questão (inclusive meses antes da hospedagem!).
Conforto garantido, principalmente pela ótima cama e travesseiros, têm mais altos e também mais baixos, de acordo com o gosto de cada um.
O serviço de portaria e segurança do prédio também estão alinhados com a gentileza e prontidão oferecidas por este local!
Super recomendado!

A lovely apartment (with a fully equipped kitchen) and a very organized host (he provided a very well structured and detailed information about almost everything in Buenos Aires). The apartment is like in the pictures, better in reality, very clean and spacious. Location wise central. Easy to reach Recoleta and Plaza de Mayo. Overall we had a great stay. 

Many thanks to Luis
reviews.response: Thanks for choosing our apart to stay in BA.

reviews.comments:
This apartment is great, in a really good central location, next to shopping areas and metro and walkable to main sites, and Puerto Madero.
We were let in by the very helpful concierge who was available all the time if we needed anything
Luis was fantastic, available all the time, and helped get us sorted when we arrived and called a taxi for us when we left
We had a metro card left for use, which was really helpful as we could get around so many more easily.
The flat is well furnished and very spacious, with lots of clean bedding and towels, hot water and excellent washing machine.
Apartment is on4 th floor,  and good working lifts
Certainly would stay again
reviews.response: Thanks for choosing our apart to stay in BA and thanks for the private feedback!

reviews.comments: Great apartment in very convenient location. Would recommend to stay here. Luis was helpful with the check in process

The best part of the experience was the hospitality of Juan (associate of Luis). He was so helpful and kind - we are very thankful for his hospitality.

The apartment is great - exactly like advertised. Location is truly fantastic, blocks away from everything, including metro and bus lines. Felt save in the area even walking back from Teatro Colon at night. 

Recommendation: get some argentine steak (vacio cut) or chorizo in the little parrilla across the street (I think it's called wild ranch). Only open for lunch but really great food!

Todo o publicado correspondendo plenamente às expectativas, assim como ao que é anunciado,  até mesmo podendo AFIRMAR que as instalações no todo acabam superando o publicado. O Luis, embora estivesse saindo de viagem ao Brasil p/ alguns dias de férias, nos indicou que seríamos recepcionados pelo JUAN (encarregado do edifício) que durante n/ estadia (9 dias) foi extremamente prestimoso em todos os aspectos, e mesmo sua esposa, mais simples fossem as informações que necessitávamos, nos atendia de forma esplêndida (até nos acompanhou à estação de metrô mais próxima), cabendo finalmente ressaltar, que mesmo estando ausente, o Luis era acessível tempo integral, fechando c/ "chave de ouro" o atendimento ao nos contatar logo após o horário que era previsto p/ que tivéssemos retornado a São Paulo - Viajo c/ m/ esposa a cada 2 anos para visitar tar Feira de Auto Pçs, seguramente reservaremos c/ certa antecedência em 2.017 ou em qualquer outra oportunidade que tenhamos necessidade de estarmos por uns dias em Buenos Aires. Nota DEZ !!!
We had a great stay in the apartment! Luis was a perfect host! Helping us in the big city!

Just perfect! Luis is extremely helpful and the apartment is nice, clean and spacious.
It was a fantastic stay!!

Semplicemente perfetto! Luis è estremamente disponibile, l'appartamento è molto carino, pulito e grande.
È stato un fantastico soggiorno!

Luis was the perfect host. We never met him but he was always available to answer any question we had over the phone. As the first time travelers to Buenos Aires with no Spanish, he really gave us good and practical tips. We felt so much at home and almost sad to leave. If we ever come back to Buenos Aires, we will certainly stay there. The apartment was so conveniently located that we walked to most of the sightseeing places we had planned. Highly recommended.

I wish there were 6 stars for Luis. His professionalism and organization were amazing and we felt totally comfortable and prepared leading up to our arrival. The house was better than described. The incredibly high ceilings with gorgeous moldings made the apartment seem so grand and dramatic. The king sized bed was very comfortable and the house layout is perfect. My boyfriend and I were in heaven staying there. The location is totally central one block from Teatro Colon and the Obelisko. Easy walk into San Telmo or Recoleta from the apartment. There isn't a single thing we would have changed. Also- Luis was incredibly accommodating and let us check in early and check out late according to our flights. A room service lady came and services the apartment on the 4th day.
I can't recommend this rental enough.
all was perfect. Nice flat, nice neighborhood, nice bed...

Luis apartment is HUGE and well located near the action in Buenos Aires.  Luis was keen enough to allow us for a later check out.  We didn't get to meet him but all communications were responded promptly with precise information.  Definitely recommended.

Luis foi um ótimo anfitrião, muito atencioso tanto antes da viagem, quanto durante. O apartamento é ótimo, melhor do que as fotos. Amplo e aconchegante. 
Juan, que era o encargado também é muito atencioso, nunca nos deixava na mão, sempre muito preocupado com a nossa comodidade. 
O prédio está muito bem localizado, no centro de Buenos Aires. Bem ao lado do obelisco, o que facilitou bastante a locomoção pela (URL HIDDEN) certeza alugaria novamente.
It was awesome and the location was incredible. We loved the apartment and Luis stayed available despite being busy with work!
The host was very attentive, very nice and very kind the fact of having his family an early sunday waiting for me at the apartment. Thanks Luis and Family!

O Luis realmente é um excelente anfitrião, qualquer dúvida como ligar o aquecedor, ar condicionado, etc... era rapidamente respondida ou sanada. 
O apartamento é maravilhoso, limpo e muito espaçoso. A localização é excelente, próxima ao Obelisco e outros pontos turísticos. 
Sem dúvida ótimo custo x benefício.

Location location location! What a
Great place to stay. We received an email before we arrived letting us know the distances from sites in BA. We walked to Recoleta the first afternoon and then took the yellow tour bus the next day. The apartment was spacious and working with the apartment concierge was a breeze! We would definitely come back to this apartment when we return to Buenos Aires!
reviews.response: Unfortunately, due to an unplanned trip, we couldn't meet in person. Hope to meet you next time! Thanks for choosing our apart to stay in BA.

reviews.comments: The Apartment was adequate and clean. The Apartment is located in the microcenter and walking distance to many important places of the city such as Theatre Colon, Plaza Mayo, Avenidad Mayo, Puerta Madero. We even walked to San Telmo and Recoletta. It is very close to shopping district Florida Street, Av Cordoba and Corrientes. Our host was very good and helpful . His assistant directed us and was very helpful.
My wife and I had a pleasant experience. The apartment was clean and well located for us. Luis was a good host and he is very helpful. We would recommend staying there.

Luis is real host, always there to help, to give advice and info, simply having him you don't feel lonely facing problems without speaking Spanish language.

Flat is as described, stylish and comfortable in a very nice and old building. Location is central so for those who are the first time in BA very good for sightseeing by walk. In case you need metro , Subte station is around the corner. Cleaning lady available on regular basis.  You have at this flat all what you need during your stay , I spent there more than month. The only thing I miss was the larger and more comfortable washroom.

I would highly recommend this flat for rental and I'm sure with the help of Luis and his assistant Juan, you will enjoy your time in this lovely city.

Very spacious, very well appointed 1-bedroom apartment. The location was perfect for our needs. The description was accurate, and checking in and out was easy. Beautifully restored building. Overall, an excellent experience. Would definitely rent again.
Un ottimo appartamento nel microcentro di Buenos Aires. Tenuto benissimo, pulito e con tutti i comfort! Ottima scelta

Nice big 1 bedroom apartment in a lovely building. The location was very central and easy to walk or catch the bus and metro. Grocery store and fruit store a few metres away and lots of shops and restaurants. I am a light sleeper so the street noise was a slight problem. Luis was very nice and helpful. He was a great host!

Luis was very welcoming and made sure to check in after I arrived to ask if everything was ok. The place itself is very nice: it's birght, has high ceilings and a lot of space. It's also very easy to get around from here, with a lot of good places in walking distance and subway stations just around the corner.
Posizione centrale strategica.  Splendido il palazzo di fine ottocento. Appartamento grande, pulito, di grande charme. Luis sempre contattabile

La communication avec Luis a été très satisfaisante durant l'ensemble de la location : réponses rapides par mail et texto + appel le premier soir (en anglais) pour s'assurer que tout était ok.
Il  nous a également autorisé à partir de l'appartement quelques heures après le délai pour le check-out, ce qui était appréciable.
Nous avons été également très bien accueilli par le réceptionniste.

Le quartier en lui-même est vraiment très central et proche des stations de métro. Etant donné son emplacement, il y a parfois effectivement un peu de bruit, mais globalement, cela a été.

L'appartement était comme décrit : spacieux et les parties communes sont magnifiques d'un point de vue architectural. Pas de problème avec le WIFI.

Une très bonne expérience donc. Je recommande.

Safety and comfort are my priorities when it comes to travel.  I have never used Airbnb before so I was apprehensive at first to use Airbnb.  I was careful and made a thorough search of a place to stay.  Then I saw Luis’ apartment, read the description of the place and I thought I give Airbnb a try.   I’m glad I chose to stay at his place.  The building is amazing!  It reminded me of the city of Barcelona and the Architect Gaudi.  It is situated conveniently to all places like theaters, restaurants, pharmacy, grocery stores, and famous landmarks.  There is a security guard inside the building that is available 24/7 and the neighborhood is safe.  The apartment itself is very clean, quiet, and huge.  I found all the comfort there just as like living in my own home.  My host, Luis was always available when I needed something.  I didn’t get a chance to meet him in person but he was always available either through his assistant, Juan, email or phone.  

Thank you, Luis for being such a great host.  I would definitely recommend your place and choose to stay in one of your apartments next time I am in BA.
reviews.response: Thanks for choosing my apart and glad to know that we acccomplished your expectations. You are welcome to come back!

reviews.comments:
If you are looking for a nice, clean and well located appartment in Buenos Aires, you have to stay there.
It was our first time planning a stay in an airbnb appartment and we definitely  don´t regret it. 
Although Luis was in Spain and we asked only one day before, he organized a Driver who waited at the airport at 10 pm and brought us safely to the appartment. Also the security guard was very friendly and helped carrying the bags to the appartment.
You get what you expect!
We highly reccommend to all our friends!

Everything about this superb and comfortable apartment was exactly as described with Luis’ description.  The apartment looks identical to the pictures shown which is comforting as often times you can show up and what you end up staying in is a far cry from what you were sold on.  Located in an older building with beautiful detail, the apartment is VERY spacious.  It had all the amenities of home with a full kitchen and appliances, i.e. kettle, toaster, oven, fridge, washing machine, etc.  Make sure you check all the draws for utensils you may need, chances are they'll already be supplied.  We added a wine key to the collection only to see later there was one in the back of the drawer.  The bathroom, supplied with clean towels, tissue, soap, shampoo and conditioner, had excellent water pressure in the shower with very hot water which was always welcomed after a day of exploration.  There are two televisions and free wifi is provided.  The apartment is located in Microcentro, one of the many neighborhoods throughout B.A., and is conveniently located to a main bus station transport just a few blocks away on the Ave. 9 de Julio.  It is also located in close proximity to various subway lines.  We felt safe travelling on foot to and from the apartment both during daytime and at night.  There are an abundance of restaurants nearby and a small supermarket just around the corner.  Unfortunately we never got to meet Luis during our stay; however he was very communicative leading up to our stay via email and did call several times during our stay to ensure we had everything we needed.  He also provides a local cell phone for use which I think is a great incentive and a very nice gesture.  I would also like to mention that due to our very early arrival time and very late departure Luis was very accommodating in allowing us for an earlier check in and later checkout.  I chose Luis’ apartment based on the many positive reviews and am happy to add my own.  It has been noted in previous reviews but I would like to reiterate that noise (especially in the evening/early morning) from the street below can carry very easily up to the bedroom window as well as noise from the adjacent apartment.  It was not a major impact for us and did not lessen the value of our stay.  If you choose to sleep on either of the sofa beds in the living room, the street noise becomes a nonissue.  All in all, 100% satisfied with our accommodation, definitely recommend the apartment and would certainly stay again if we were to return to B.A.!  Thank you Luis!

We were very satisfied with the apartment. The location is very good and the apartment is well equipped, including a washing machine, a large stove, an oven and a microwave. The key pickup is conveniently organized.
Luis was a great host. He has a wonderfully situated apartment that was a delight to stay in. Would definitely recommend.

The apartment is exactly as described. I arrived late at night and someone was here to open the door for me; the check out was super simple.

Very good experience.

Everything was absolutely perfect. Apartment was really great.
Worth recommending, will be coming back for sure.

Amplo apartamento em um charmoso edifício antigo perto de vários pontos turísticos. O entorno próximo está um pouco deteriorado. O apartamento em si é confortável, mas necessita de pequenos cuidados. A internet esteve instável, não encontramos o ferro de passar roupa, o porta toalha do banheiro e a torneira da pia da cozinha estavam soltos. A cama é ótima, há armários, os sofás são confortáveis. Apesar de haver ruído na rua, quando se fecha a janela, o apartamento fica silencioso. O banho é ótimo. O responsável por nos receber, o Juan, foi muito atencioso e o celular que ficou à nossa disposição nos auxiliou bastante. Enfim, é um bom custo x benefício.
Luis's apartment was really fantastic. It's huge and in a great location. Luis was a very helpful host with lots of local information. We would definitely recommend this accommodation.
